Action.author: ckochenower
Action.body: ~zhigunenko.dsr - I also noticed that on my 10 node cluster that a `ledger get-validator-info` call takes 4 to 6 seconds to return when all 10 nodes are reachable and the indy-node service is running. However, it takes 1 minute and 44 seconds or more (consistently) if even one of the ten nodes is unreachable or the indy-node service is stopped.
